description: This CSS file defines variables for theme management and applies styles to components of a Tic Tac Toe web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application, including layout, text alignment, and background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, controlling layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning and interactive states.
